/** * This class represents the iterator for a BezierPath. * It can be used to retrieve all of the elements in a BezierPath. * The {@link BezierPath#getPathIterator} * method is used to create a * BezierPathIterator for a particular BezierPath. * The iterator can be used to iterator the path only once. * Subsequent iterations require a new iterator. * * @author Werner Randelshofer * @version 1.0 7. Mai 2007 Created. */
